svg.text: View Leaderboard Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
View Leaderboard
Actor(s):
Regular User
Description:
Displays competitive ranking system with five-tier structure (Bronze to Diamond)
showing user rankings, XP progress, and filtering options for different categories.
Preconditions:
1. User must be logged in to view personalized ranking information
Main Flow:
1. User navigates to Leaderboard page from sidebar navigation
2. System displays five-tier ranking structure: Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum, Diamond
3. System shows user's current tier with distinctive badge and color coding
4. System displays top 10 users in current tier with rankings
5. Each entry shows: rank, profile picture, username, XP points, tier badge
6. System highlights current user's position in the leaderboard
7. User can filter by different tiers using tier selection buttons
8. System provides XP progress bar showing advancement to next tier
9. Clickable user profiles allow viewing other users' public information
10. System displays tier requirements and advancement criteria
11. Real-time updates reflect current standings and tier changes
Alternative Flows:
A1. Tier advancement: User reaches new tier, system displays promotion notification
A2. View different tier: User selects different tier to view those rankings
A3. Profile navigation: User clicks on another user to view their profile
A4. Refresh rankings: System updates leaderboard with latest XP calculations
A5. Empty tier: System displays message when tier has no active users
A6. Tie handling: System manages users with identical XP scores
